website_summaries.verdict: Good portability combined with extra convenience and durability. A good alternative for carrying formula while shopping.
pros: The three chamber design of the cup will hold 9 oz
The lid rotates around so you can pour out each chamber individually
Center divider is removable to use the cup with other liquids or foods
cons: Oval opening is difficult to use with some baby bottles without spilling formula

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying workout supps.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold protein, pre and post workout supps. It's the perfect size to hold a scoop of protein, and has ample space for your pre's and posts. The lid stays on well and stays closed, so you can fill 2 or 3 and keep them in your bag and you don't have to stress over mess. Sometimes I fill a couple and put them in the suitcase when travelling, and they work just fine. Personally, I would prefer maybe 10% more volume, as a scoop of protein fits EXACTLY (ish) and it would be nice to have some room to play. Great for workout stuff; don't have babies so I cant attest to the volume for baby formula.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold formula. I bought both colors the pink and gray. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to make it easy to take formula powder with us in the diaper bag so we could make bottles on the go. It also turns out this is great for premeasuring formula for night feeds so I don't have to mess with measuring out partial scoops when I just want to get back to bed asap. The idea is great and it does work, but it could be improved. The hole in the lid where you pour out formula is not at the very edge of the lid, so it's hard to pour out the formula. You have to kind of tilt it different ways and tap it to get it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Great for the diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my diaper bag for making bottles on the go. I take this as well as one of the little 8oz water bottles in my bag. I like this because I don't have to touch the formula in case my hands are dirty. Just turn the dial to the section you want, then pop the top and pour the formula into the bottle. I only carry 1 scoop in each section but I think it's plenty big enough for several scoops. It cleans easily in the dishwasher, and also the divided section is removable so you could use it for snacks past the formula stage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Good with issues
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer than carrying around a container of formula in a diaper bag. It fits a lot. Spin the lid to empty the compartment. I do have the same problem as many others that the powder gets stuck and you really have to shake it but still works fine. My tommee tippee holders are used more than this but I love having options and this will hold more powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Design is Difficult to Pour
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a convenient way to premeasure and take powdered formula, but turned out to be more frustrating than anything else I’ve used. The container is bulky, however, I can over look that. It’s the actual pouring of the powder into the bottle which sets it on the one-star path. There is no way to get all the formula out without shaking the container leading to water going in, powder getting on the floor, or the container flying out of my hand. As pictured, you can see the shelf/lip prevents formula from pouring. Ideally, I’d like a one-hand container where I can open, flip, and pour. This just doesn’t fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Polka Dot Pajamas

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this with the first kid???
customer_reviews.text: We formula fed our first child and are starting to formula feed our 2nd. I just bought this and used it a few times. I have no idea how I managed without this with the first kid. This is durable and makes life so much easier. So when we are on the go, I just pack the bottles with water in them (you wouldn’t have to I just prefer to) and then add the formula when ready. No need for cold packs or anything like that. I also like that it can be used as a snack cup later so it’s not just good for formula feeding! Cleans easily too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily T

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh how did I ever live without this. A must if you use or supplement with formula. I breastfeed but we use formula to supplement because my daughter is a premie. Alothough I am looking forward to only breast feeding having this makes it so much easier to have my daughter be portable. We just fill a bottle with the distilled water and bring the right amount of formula in the chamber. And bam! We have a safety bottle if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This are a great concept and they are very useful, though I will say you have to shake these things around for a few minutes when trying to get the formula out. The formula gets caught on the little ridges on the inside of the container and if you aren’t careful you will spill it everywhere trying to get it out. But again, these are great for traveling, I eventually just switched to formula dispenser bottles which are great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kimrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! What a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s great at dispensing- especially on the go or just doing ridiculous 3/4am feedings when you’re too sleepy to scoop formula and measure water. I just keep this in her bedroom and place bottles in her room pre-filled with water. My only complaint (but I would totally recommend this product regardless) is that it is a little difficult to clean by hand. The inner dividers collect formula along the bottom edges. It’s hard to reach those areas to clean thoroughly with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousComics

customer_reviews.title: Best Formula Container. Just remove the divider.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST container to carry your formula. I just took out the divider & packed it with formula. If your baby is drinking 6 oz (3 scoops) every 3 hours, this container will hold around 3-4 feedings of powder. I don’t even use the small opening, I just open the whole kid. TIP: Cut the end of a scoop’s handle so it will fit into the container when on the go. That avoids you from have to use the small opening. It’s easier to just open the whole lid. Don’t be lazy!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it...
customer_reviews.text: I somehow have ended up with 3 of these contraptions- all 3 different brands and this one is my favorite...lid snaps well and the pour apout shuts well also...i havent had any problems with the container coming open! I like the color and I also like there are 3 compartments for 3 seperate servings of formula. The 3 compartments are actually apart of one big insert that can come out of the bowl itself...so this can transform from a formula dispenser, to a snack container.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Boone

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: When I had my son, 11 years ago, I had one of these. I couldn't even begin to tell you how useful it was. When I found out I was pregnant again.... one of the first thing I put on my registry was 2 of these. And then I just ended up buying them off my registry for myself. It went toward my purchase for my "welcome" box and I made sure that I got them. Win/win. Extra win... these are actually better than the ones I used to have. The sectioned part is removable. I'm very happy that these are still a thing.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper
customer_reviews.text: I like this dispenser because it has 3 separate spots to put premeasured formula into. My only issue that I have is cleaning. The piece is in 3 parts, a outside container, the separated piece and the lid. The lid always gets formula stuck in the edges of the spout that lets the formula come out. This thing has been a time saver for me though, so I still use it! I plan to use it for small snacks when my little one is done with formula
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Almost pointless
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of it but it doesnt make life all that easy... its hard to get the formula out... literally have to shake it so many times... (with a hungry baby crying for food) this is not helpful... the container top is what i had the most trouble with... moving it from one section to the next is difficult.... moms need a little more help here wish it was made with a little more thought
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy container to have around. I used these for my kid and now that I'm caring for my niece. It holds up to 4 scoops of formula in each compartment and closes securely. The divided insert is not flimsy at all. If you are in and out of the house a lot like we are it is much more convenient to carry than a full canister and less worry than preparing a bottle that you have to worry may go bad before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: No problems, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality and what I expected from the images & description. I'd buy again. Could use some slight improvement since It is a little bulky to pack. Since it's round, the shape isn't as efficient. Also would prefer a screw-on lid vs snap-on. I haven't had it come off by itself, but I worry when traveling it could get dropped and if the lid popped off & formula spilled, I would be SOL. Screw-on would ease my mind.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very cute. For some reason the formula we use sticks to the inside. It's fully dry when we fill it and I wash it regularly. This leads to me shaking the container really hard, and having to tap it on the bottle to try to get the rest out sometimes. Also didn't realize there wasn't a hole to secure the top when opening. I just find it very convenient on my other one. Not their fault of course. And let me add that our formula doesn't stick to that other one either. This one serves its purpose, but I'll honestly be looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for those on-the-go
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for those on-the-go as you can store formula pre-portioned. My only complaint is that the formula powder sometimes gets "stuck" in it, so you can't get it all out super fast... but, I don't have a faster & more economical alternative (individual baggies is wasteful & would get expensive), so I still use it whenever I take my kiddo out for long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, color and style looks exactly like the picture and this container is exactly what I wanted....it definitely fits it's purpose. The container is of a sturdy & durable plastic, it can be used as a snack bowl for toddlers or for powdered formula for infants...absolutely love it. Delivery was also great, received quickly and before the scheduled time.
customer_reviews.author: RKP

customer_reviews.title: so handy
customer_reviews.text: the only con i have with this item is that it is a little hard to dispense from. The initial pour is great but then you have to tilt it from side to side to get all the formula out of the section. It can be a little time consuming when you have a screaming hungry baby, but having everything pre-measured is great! Not having to carry around a tub of formula is nice. Once we're done with formula it'll be great for little snacks too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hessenauer

customer_reviews.title: Product not at all used friendly!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw too many good reviews about the product and ordered it. But, the product is not at all easy to use per the reviews. Lid doesn't rotate easily which is the important aspect of this product. Completely disappointed after getting it, seeing so many good reviews. Manufacturer need to keenly check the product for this defect or else it's not a useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Sansmiles

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking formula or snacks on the road. The only downside is that formula gets stuck inside sometimes bc of the construction. The opening does fit perfectly in the top of most bottles to prevent spillage. Would be better if the opening went to the edge and was flush with the cover rather than raised to prevent formula from getting stuck inside.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Work Great, Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We had a formula tower previously & I bought these to take up less space in the diaper bag and also to not have to rearrange the tower compartments (they stack vertically and you have to move them to get a new bottle ready). THESE are awesome! I thought it was weird to have to buy 2, but I'm happy to have 2 now. SUPER EASY TO USE, no complaints whatsoever. Easy to clean (dishwasher safe), easy and simple to get a new bottle ready.
customer_reviews.author: An90dcba

customer_reviews.title: Pour carefully
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great addition to the diaper bag and simplifies night feedings. However, the shape of the compartments requires you to carefully pour the formula from the compartment to avoid leaving a bunch in the compartment. This issue isn't a big deal, but it's something to pay attention to.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dispenser! We had one of these with our first child and loved it but unfortunately it was put in the dishwasher and it never closed properly after that. After the first one we purchased a munchkin one from Target that looked very similar but it was hard to get the formula to dispense properly so we bought another agent unit. Hopefully this one stays out of the dishwasher and we should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Food lover

customer_reviews.title: Cap is hard to close and compartments don't swivel easily.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how hard the cap is to get off nor trying to swivel to the next compartment. It's not an easy transition from compartment to compartment. You also have to really shake the formula out at every angle to not leave any formula inside. I wish it was easier to use. It is made of sturdy plastic I will say that though.
customer_reviews.author: Ayancy

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I only discovered this product a couple of months ago (I'm a new mom). It's been a lifesaver!! Love the little container as it gets us through an outing. It hold 3 servings. My LO is drinking 2.5 scoops (5 oz) and it fits it fine. I'm sure it'll fit 3 scoops fine as well! Look forward to using this continuously! :)
customer_reviews.author: MollySui

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, open and close!
customer_reviews.text: This one is SO much easier to open than the Parent's Choice brands I used to buy. I love that the divider insert comes out easily to turn it into a snack cup. My son is still strictly on formula, so that's the only thing I've used it for so far. It stays closed, even when I'm digging through the diaper bag looking for something else. It's super easy to clean. It does take some shaking and jiggling to get all the powder out, but that's not really a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Orange_Dream

customer_reviews.title: Crazy useful use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say the usefulness of this is unbelievable. I use it every day in the diaper bag and send it to playgroup so I can keep track of what she eats. The best was when I flew with my daughter alone on a plane I could easily make her bottles when we were both in one seat on the plane
customer_reviews.author: RachiZilcha

customer_reviews.title: dual purpose
customer_reviews.text: i love these! easy to use and the formula powder can fit into smaller bottles like the dr brown bottles we use now without a huge mess. i reuse them for snacks when the formula is done!! you can put a variety in them! goldfish, cheerios and puffs all fit nicely and come out easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying formula in the diaper bag in equal proportions. Plus it’s easy to clean and easy to use to make a bottle when baby is crying. I was worried that it might get stuck when trying to open in a hurry, but it works great. I’m looking forward to also using it in the future for small foods when baby starts eating solids.
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave me the joovy brand formula dispenser & the lid would fall off after about a month of use. I love that this one is sturdy. The lid doesn’t come off unless you want it to. The removable 3 compartment is a great feature. We use it for formula at the moment. Excited that we can use it for snacks when my son gets older.
customer_reviews.author: SKYE COX

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. Great solution for storing pre-portioned formula in your ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Great solution for storing pre-portioned formula in your diaper bag. Super easy to line up the cap with the section you want to take formula out of. It takes a minute to get the formula out (you have to tap it and shake it around a bit), but it's relatively mess-free as long as you line it up with your bottle. Oh, and make sure it's completely dry (from cleaning) before putting more formula in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews before buying this and was hesitant to purchase. But I bought it and I absolutely love it! Easy to clean and when you dump the formula into the bottle on the go, it’s not difficult to get all the formula serving out with just a little shake (people complained that it was hard to get out). Also, it’s one solid piece that divides it into 3 portions. So it doesn’t slip through the cracks (also read that complaint that it messed up their divided proportions).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for making travel with a baby even easier!
customer_reviews.text: Having just had our baby a few months ago, we rely on these dispensers a lot throughout the day. We used them when my daughter was an infant as well. They are easy to fill, neat and a simple way to travel with formula. We are very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry123

customer_reviews.title: Work great multiuse...
customer_reviews.text: It's a two in one and its great. I was using it for formula but was only able to put 3 see ings worth for 3 bottles so took the compartment cup out and used the snack cup to put formula it fits roughly 6 servings of two ounces each and the scooper for the formula fits it there twoo
customer_reviews.author: Cynra

customer_reviews.title: Great for trips and the sort.
customer_reviews.text: After carrying the single packs of formula around, I knew there had to be a better way. This is so much easier than having to buy the formula singles. Its got room for 3 servings (which is more than enough for travel). If I was going any further, I'd just bring the whole container. For small trips and for stressful days, a pre-poured amount is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GreenFishTravels

customer_reviews.title: Great formula dispenser!!! Makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dispenser cups. They are very convenient for the diaper bag and at home. They stay closed tight. Yes you have to shake it around to get all the formula out but I don't know of a dispenser you don't have to do that with. I also like that the formula divider comes out later to use for snacks, 2 containers for the price of 1!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry formula and snacks
customer_reviews.text: I like these for storing dry formula in the diaper bag or on the bedside table for easier night feeding. When baby is older they make nice snack holders. Easy to clean just throw in the dishwasher. Only negative is that the formula can shift to the other compartments and throw off the measurements if turned upside down so I have to be careful and secure it in the diaper bag in a section where it can’t flip over. Other then that it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tbfabulous

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like this at all. The inside compartment comes out, which can create moisture or nasty build up if no washed and dried carefully. You have to tap the dispenser side to side to make sure all formula comes out. I’ve had a munchkin brand in the past and that’s what I prefer
customer_reviews.author: Keshia_518

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed. It holds a decent amount however it’s difficukt to dump into the bottle and my lid came broken. The flap just fall off when I open it instead of staying attached to the lid. There has to be a better one on the market that dumps easier into a bottle. It’s cute and compact and better than carrying a formula container around but not everything I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Travis A Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Made for easy bottle prepping
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for on the go bottle prepping. You load your dividers with formula you’ll need for a feeding and when it’s time just pour it into your bottle with water. I love how it comes with a separate cup that slides into the container with the dividers built in. Easy removable for easy cleaning. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Osnaya

customer_reviews.title: Makes traveling a little easier
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient way to travel with formula. I like that the divided formula container is is own cup so formula doesn't get transferred from one compartment to another. So it's a cup within a cup. Only complaint is there is a ledge between the edge of the container and the spout so you have to shake it and turn it a lot to get all the powder out.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshiny

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two and use them daily, even when we're home. The only thing I don't like about them is that you really have to shake the container around to get all the powder out. It's easy to leave a chunk of powder in the section if you don't check.
customer_reviews.author: iPeix

customer_reviews.title: Definately buy for formula babies
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. When going on short trips around home or an outing that is all day, this comes in handy. Instead of carrying the big box of formula you can distribute different formula amounts in each compartment. Easy to clean, very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: melony

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: You have to shake a lot to get the powder out. Our other dispenser is rounded, so it slides right out. This one has a pretty flat top so it gets stuck. This one was also more expensive, I guess just because its black.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a game changer, I wish I knew about it right away. A little formula powder usually gets stuck inside when I’m trying to dump it in a bottle but that’s okay. I already recommended this container to a ftm friend.
customer_reviews.author: sugarsugar

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for bigger amounts of formula but it’s difficult to get out. This can be tricky during night time feedings. It is also pretty large in the diaper bag. Cleaning is timely as many areas cake up with formula and getting deep in there is tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal C.

customer_reviews.title: We have had many of these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! They are by far the best formula container we've had. We've only bought new ones because our dog chews them up if they have formula in them and we leave them anywhere she can get them. We like to keep one in the diaper bag and one in our room for night time feedings. They definitely hold the largest volume and have the widest mouth of any of the other brands we've tried. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't QUITE work how I was planning but it definitely does what it was meant to.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to hold my vitamins (gummies) in one section and my protein powder in the others. It did a pretty good job but there would be a light dusting of protein powder on my vitamins. Not the end of the world but it did make them taste funny. Now I just use it for protein powder only and it is great :) I took one star off because of the little bit of transfer but it really isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jane WW

customer_reviews.title: A staple in the diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this thing. It ALWAYS ready before we go out and empty when we get home after a day of family fun. It seals tight and we haven't had any spills. She even leaves it ready at night to save us making sleepy eye mistakes in the dark. Happy wife, happy life; and a happy baby makes everyone happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eins-tein

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: If you use formula this is a must have for a day out! It divides 3 servings of formula so you can have enough to make 3 separate bottles already dosed out. the divider insert can come out easily for cleaning and then you can use the container for snacks. Dishwasher safe makes for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack container!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for storing my baby's snacks. Love that I can put 3 different snacks in 1 container so she has options. Also can use this to store powder baby formula. Able to make the kids I babysit 3 bottles with 1 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: The product works, but not very well. The hole in the top is too small to get all the formula out, so it doesn't really save time to have it already measured. We kept it to use in our diaper bag, but I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Car-in

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel. 3 bottle of 4oz.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little formula dispenser. It gives you 3 bottle of 4 oz each. Great to go out, just being your water, clean bottle and you good to go. If this review was helpful please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: Formula users
customer_reviews.text: If you're using this for formula just make sure it's in a spot (in diaper bag or wherever) where it won't get shaken up because the divider that sits in it, the formula slips through the top a little. Doesn't spill out, but gets mixed up a little (not lots) with the other pre measured formula in the other sections if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter to use for her baby. She love it, makes traveling easier due to the face, it has 3 compartments to store 3 separate feedings. A great price and product. Would make a great baby gift.
customer_reviews.author: marty g.

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking formula on the go
customer_reviews.text: Works great for taking formula on the go. However, the inside liner did warp a bit when I sterilized it in a microwave steam bag prior to the first use. Not a huge deal, but it did say it was steam sterilizer safe. The warping doesn’t really affect using the product. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size, however I don’t like that the lid can move so easily. It’s hard to see through so you don’t know if you are half way into another compartment and therefore getting too much formula. There are better ones out there with a better designed lid that clicks into place with ever compartment.
customer_reviews.author: tashat

customer_reviews.title: Good divider, but many times to dispense formula
customer_reviews.text: I use it for baby’s formula. I like that the dividers is all one piece and doesn’t move, therefore formula doesn’t mix with the ones in other slots. I do wish dispensing was better. I have to try about 3 times before it all comes completely out. I got it for night time use so that didn’t really work out. Using a small bottle for the formula measurement and pouring that into baby’s bottle worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jfh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Protein Shakes!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my protein shakes and it’s been a lifesaver! It’s so much easier putting a couple of scoops of protein in this and throwing it in my bag, instead of having to use plastic baggies or carry around the giant protein tub!
customer_reviews.author: Krystalyn Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Dr. brown version works better...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this one nearly as much as my Dr. Browns. Several issues here...the shape of the mouth of this container isn't "funnel shaped" at all so it doesn't pour out well. Also the container has three parts when only two are necessary which make for more work with washing. Also the top spins too easily and I have almost accidentally put some of multiple segments into the bottle at the same time because the lid spun.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Live saver
customer_reviews.text: This product is a LIFE SAVER. We had to stop breastfeeding at 3 months so we switched over to formula. We all the doctors appointments and being a single mom, we always need bottles on the go. So, this handy thing is amazing for that
customer_reviews.author: karlee

customer_reviews.title: Must have for on the go formula!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go. We use it all the time. It's cheaper (and really easy) to put our own formula in this rather than buy the prepackaged formula. We have it in blue & grey. The blue is a little easier to see through (to see how much is left). I wish the grey was a little lighter for that reason, but overall we love it. I also like that we can remove the internal divider in the future and use for snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: East Bay Jen

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be clear container!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel but NOT for middle of the night bottles! The formula is hard to get out, and since the container isn’t clear you can’t really tell if you got it all when you’re in the dim light of a night light trying to make a bottle, however these were fantastic for day trips out!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyOffshore

customer_reviews.title: Yassss
customer_reviews.text: I love these! And that it comes in gray! I’m so tired of everything being green or blue or pink. Everything my son has is gray anyway so I just liked that it matches. Really good quality. No accidents with it. Glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but not the best design.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has three separate compartments, can hold plenty of formula in each, and is easy to open and close. I do not like that the opening to dispense the powder is so much smaller than the compartment itself - you cannot get all the formula out even after repeated shakes. I also do not like that powder easily gets stuck under the lid. Formula is too expensive to lose excess like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver at night when you’re half asleep and don’t want to measure out the formula. Also for traveling out and about, no need to bring the whole formula container.
customer_reviews.author: Karen and Luke

customer_reviews.title: The best formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This formula dispenser is my favorite. Each section easily holds enough formula for a 8 oz bottle. And the bonus feature is that the divider can be removed and you can use it for snacks and such as your child gets older. I also like that the spout is wider than another brand I have so it is easier to pour the formula into the bottle. The dispenser cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: JPdex

customer_reviews.title: Great formula dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: We love this formula dispenser! It turns between sections easily and is easy to get the formula out. It's also nice that you can remove the divider part. We had bought a second Babies R Us brand dispenser to have another thinking they all would work about the same, but that one was terrible in comparison to this. It was hard to open and get the formula out, and was so bad that I threw it out and bought another one of these. I would only buy this one now.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Traveling With Baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling with formula. Three divided sections allow you to carry three feedings. The divider can be removed to have just one small bowl for toddler snack(s).
customer_reviews.author: Cody D.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to turn, open or close. I used a three section dispenser like this in the past and I was generally happy with it. But this one seems to be very difficult to open or turn between sections. When you have a crying baby in one hand and trying to quickly mix up formula, this issue becomes really really important.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Must've been created by a mom on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of money on the individual travel formula powder packets until I finally discovered this awesome dispenser! This little dispenser saved me a lot of money and hassle. The travel packets were great until my daughter was taking odd numbers of ounces... the packets only come in increments of 4 oz and trying to split a packet to make 5 or 6 oz was a pain! This dispenser allowed me to measure out exactly what she was taking at the time. AND it can later be used as a snack container. PERFECT! Thank you AVENT!
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: This has made life so much easier for being on the go with my little!
customer_reviews.text: This has made life so much easier for being on the go with my little! No more heavy diaper bags because I need to tote the entire container of formula around. It will also be great for snacks when she is older.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenna

customer_reviews.title: Family SWEARS by these!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is a foster parent with 60+ kids and she has used these since day 1! They are so easy to use, easy to clean and she has never had a spillage issue! Wont regret using these!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi S

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and will hold plenty if formula when you are in the go, the lid snaps on snug and its very easy to dispense formula when needed, it also has 3 sections to fill.
customer_reviews.author: stephan c.

customer_reviews.title: Not only for baby formula!
customer_reviews.text: I saw my cousin using this with her baby for baby formula and so I bought it for transporting protein powder when I go out of town. Not the intended use but it works great, you can put about 6 servings of protein powder (and up to 3 different kinds) in the container. Also it does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula holder. Unlike a previous storage container I had purchased, it does not spill into the other compartments. Formula stays put the way you measured it. Another nice feature is It can act as snack storage, the compartment divider is removable. Clearly great for travel, on the go, or grandma's house.
customer_reviews.author: M james

customer_reviews.title: It just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t work for me. Every time I’d go to pour the pre measured formula into the bottle, some the formula in the next compartment would fall go into the compartment next to it. The oval shaped opening caused some issues with spillage as well. No matter now I poured the formula. This would probably work better for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use for formula.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I don’t like it as a formula dispenser. I’ll probably using it for snacks later on when she’s old enough for that. Formula gets caught in the cracks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bar

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite dispenser. There is an outer and an inner container. The powder can slip between the two. The formula doesn't dispense as easily as some others.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Milton

customer_reviews.title: So handy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was putting my daughter's formula in a plastic bag and funneling it into her bottle with a make-shift paper funnel before I purchased this wonderful item. Now I feel like I dope for not getting this sooner! It makes putting together her milk snacks soooooo much easier! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a ziploc bag saver! Works great and not sure how much it holds in each section but I know it will hold at least enough for a 10 ounce bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L Williamson

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite formula holder for travel. It holds enough for an 8oz bottle in each section. It has three parts so the divided insert can be washed separately or removed to use it to dispense small snacks for a toddler. The plastic is heavy and durable and the attached lid snaps securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for diaper bags & travel!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for diaper bags!!! We have 2 of these and put dofferent amounts in each container. We carry a water bottle with us in the diaper bag just in case we have no water access. This is a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Deziel Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of my mom friends had a similar product for her son so I decided to buy this for when my daughter was born to make it easier instead of carrying around a container of formula. It works great and fits in my diaper bag perfectly. It is easy to shake the formula out and the lid snaps on and off for easy filling and cleaning. You can take out the divider and fill it with snacks for an older child. I plan on buying more so my older kids can have a container for snacks on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Hate it, try pouring from one section and then formula spills over from the other sections messing up the amount of formula ending up in the bottle. I used it a few times trying to make it work but was a waste of time and money. If you need a good one at a decent price try the munchkin formula dispenser, it has rubber stoppers at the top that dont allow the other sections to dispense the formula into other sections.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Cute & Love
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost on the daily for travel and I love how the inside insert comes out for cleaning. In comparison to the one we used for our first baby the powder does not get leaked under to the other dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Deonnei

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bring powdered formula in my diaper bag. It’s very easy to dispense and clean, and I like that it has separate compartments. The compartment section can also come out so it’s just one big cup. Very useful and will continue to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: youretheaudience

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Formula Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day since my daughter has to have a certain amount of cereal in every bottle due to acid reflux. Its faster than measuring everything out for every single bottle. And these are great for traveling so i dont have to carry around a formula can or cereal box. The three way divider comes out and you can use it as a snack bowl for when they get older! And these are great quality. I've had them for 7 months and they're still like new.
customer_reviews.author: kgray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for diaper bag. Hubby was tired of the messiness of dumping formula from ziplocks and we didn’t want to carry full can of formula. We also use one in nursery for nighttime feedings so we don’t have to go downstairs to mix a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: GIJaynee

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this container!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how convenient it is to be able to pack enough formula for three bottles in one small container. It holds enough formula for 3 eight ounce bottles and is so easy to dispense and clean up is easy as well. Would recommend to anyone with a baby, for running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stutz

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible but not awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows when you put formula in something like that a little bit of formula gets left behind because it doesn’t pour out easily. I just assume by there to go packs that Enfamil makes.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Rovenstine

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking my daughter to daycare or out to do errands. I don’t have to lug around her full can of formula. It’s been very durable so far and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Anyone that has infants on formula or watches babies on ...
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that has infants on formula or watches babies on formula should have one of these! If you don't want to pay the price of the premade packets of formula this is so handy!
customer_reviews.author: victoria buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great formula storage for the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: I always liked Avent products. This is great for on the go. I can pour the formula without causing a mess I don't need to bring the whole can in the diaper bag anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn
customer_reviews.text: I had these 5 years ago with my first baby and I loved them. The design must've changed because it will not spin easily to go to the next section
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adults too.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my protein powder, pre workout and post workout. It’s perfect. It’s a little hard to spin on the top when moving between compartments but I’d rather the seal be sturdy and have to turn it a little harder than it to come off and waste powders. Is exactly what I was looking for and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: GenaWoods

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc I didn’t like the one my wife purchased. Hers ended up breaking and has tried to steal mine. I’m gonna have to order a new one and this product is fantastic and much higher quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson43CAPS

product_meta.title: Philips Avent Powder Formula Dispenser and Snack Cup, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GreyKeep formula and snacks fresh and secure while on the go with the Philips Avent SCF135/18 Powder Formula Dispenser & Snack Cup. With compartments for three 9 ounce pre-measured formula feeds and a rotating cap that prevents powder spilling into other compartment shells, it is ideal for travel. It simply converts into a handy snack cup. It is also microwave safe, dishwasher safe and can be sterilized for easy cleaning. Available in 3 colors: Grey, pink and blue
feature_bullets: Makes on the go feeding easier
Holds enough powdered formula for 3 to 260 milliliter/9 ounce feeds
With the inner section removed, the dispenser makes a handy snack cup
Rotating cap prevents powder spilling into other compartment shells
This BPA free dispenser is dishwasher safe, microwavable and suitable for sterilizing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,894 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
